name: EpisodeNinja
0:
”Alexa, ask Episode Ninja what's the best episode of The Simpsons”
”Alexa, ask Episode Ninja what's the best episode of Seinfeld”
”Alexa, ask Episode Ninja what's the best episode of Game of Thrones”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: episode ninja
des: By aggregating tens of thousands of user generated episode ratings, we have determined the "best" episode of any television show.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
